import React, { useState } from 'react' import { useDispatch } from 'react-redux'; import {AiOutlineCamera} from 'react-icons/ai' import {BsCardImage} from 'react-icons/bs'; import styles from './EditModal.module.css' const EditModal = ({user}) => { const dispatch = useDispatch(); const [form,setForm] = useState({ username: user.username, tel: user.tel, gender: user.gender, address: user.address, bio: user.bio, avatar: user.avatar, background: user.background }); const inputChangeHandler = e => { setForm({ ...form, [e.target.name] :e.target.value }) } const closeModal = () => { dispatch({type: 'MODAL', payload: false}); } const submitHandler = () => { dispatch(updateUser(form)); } return (
Edit Profile
Change Avatar
Change Background
Cancel
Submit
) } export default EditModal
